Package com.sun.jna.platform.unix.solaris

Provides common library mappings for the Solaris (SunOS) platform.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Kstat2
    Kstat2 library.
    LibKstat
    Kstat library.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Kstat2.Kstat2Handle
    Opaque kstat handle.
    Kstat2.Kstat2Map
    Opaque kstat map handle.
    Kstat2.Kstat2MatcherList
    Opaque kstat match list.
    Kstat2.Kstat2NV
    Immutable Name/Value pair.
    Kstat2.Kstat2NV.UNION  
    Kstat2.Kstat2NV.UNION.IntegersArr  
    Kstat2.Kstat2NV.UNION.StringsArr  
    LibKstat.Kstat
    The kernel maintains a linked list of statistics structures, or kstats.
    LibKstat.KstatCtl
    A kstat control structure.
    LibKstat.KstatIntr
    Interrupt statistics.
    LibKstat.KstatIO
    IO Statistics.
    LibKstat.KstatNamed
    A list of arbitrary name=value statistics.
    LibKstat.KstatNamed.UNION  
    LibKstat.KstatNamed.UNION.STR  
    LibKstat.KstatTimer
    Event timer statistics.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Kstat2StatusException
    Exception encapsulating Kstat2 Error Return Values, defined as kstat2_status values in kstat2.h

Package com.sun.jna.platform.unix.solaris Description

Provides common library mappings for the Solaris (SunOS) platform.
